About

Course by for Food&Code

Code as cooking. You take something, you do stuff on it, and then you output the result. In cooking, and in coding. We’ll use this analogy all around.

4 paths of knowledge * Skills. Tech skills. * Possibilities. Input, Output, Brains. * Scenography. The physical part of the virtual * Stylisation. Let’s make my art mine.

We’ll be using P5JS Javascript, FTW.

http://blockbuilder.org/
